arts.ttl: Barcelona winger ruled out of Real Oviedo clash but targets comeback against Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Although he made headlines recently by winning the Kopa Trophy and finishing second in the Ballon d’Or 2025 rankings, the FC Barcelona forward Lamine Yamal has been unable to participate in the last few games for his team. The 18-year-old forward has been struggling with pubalgia (groin discomfort) and has already missed games against Valencia, […] The post Barcelona winger ruled out of Real Oviedo clash but targets comeback against Real Sociedad appeared first on Sempre Barca.
